quote: Captain's log, stardate 41309.5.   We are in orbit around Persephone   V where I have been sent to confer   with Admiral Mark Jameson in   regard to an extraordinary   situation....
scene: 1    EXT. SPACE - ENTERPRISE IN ORBIT (OPTICAL)

quote: Starfleet received this subspace   transmission two days ago,   Admiral.
scene: 2    INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE ON PICARD

quote: Let's see it, Captain.
scene: 2    INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE ON PICARD

quote: On screen and relay to the   admiral, Mister Data.
scene: 2    INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE ON PICARD

quote: I am Karnas, governor of Mordan   IV. A dissident terrorist group   has taken Federation Ambassador   Hawkins and his staff hostage.   They will not discuss terms with   me. This is a crisis I cannot   resolve without assistance. The   terrorists are demanding a   Federation negotiator.
scene: 2    INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE ON PICARD

quote: I feel there is only one   negotiator with the skills and   understanding to resolve this   situation. The hostages' lives   will depend on Starfleet   delivering this man to Mordan.   Commander Mark Jameson.       Admiral Jameson. The terrorists   have given you six Earth days to   arrive here -- or the hostages   will die. Please...hurry.
scene: 2    INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE ON PICARD

quote: Starfleet doesn't understand how   or why this situation developed.   Mordan IV has finally gained peace   after decades of civil war --
scene: 2    INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE ON PICARD

quote: Forty years of civil war, Captain.
scene: 2    INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE ON PICARD

quote: Yes, sir. Karnas was largely   responsible for the planet's   unification and peace. Why   should he suddenly be unable to   deal with rebellious factions?
scene: 2    INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE ON PICARD

quote: Forty-five years ago I negotiated   a hostage situation on Mordan.   Karnas was a young man then....       ... but so was I. He seems to feel   I can handle the situation again.   Obviously Starfleet feels that   way too, or you wouldn't be here.
scene: 2    INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE ON PICARD

quote: I'm detailed to take you to Mordan   IV as soon as you can be ready,   Admiral.
scene: 2    INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE ON PICARD

quote: My wife and I will beam aboard   at 1500 hours, Captain. Be   prepared to depart this starbase   and proceed immediately to Mordan   IV. Acknowledge.
scene: 2    INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE ON PICARD

quote: Received and acknowledged, sir.   Picard out.
scene: 2    INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE ON PICARD

quote: Nearly 1500 now, sir.
scene: 2    INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE ON PICARD

quote: Well, Number One. Why don't we   go and welcome the admiral aboard?
scene: 2    INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE ON PICARD

quote: Admiral Jameson, sir. Have you   met him before?
scene: 12   INT. TRANSPORTER ROOM - ANGLE ON TRANSPORTER CHIEF,

quote: Your hero, Number One?
scene: 12   INT. TRANSPORTER ROOM - ANGLE ON TRANSPORTER CHIEF,

quote: Not only mine. My father served   on the Falcon with him. I grew   up on stories about Mark Jameson.
scene: 12   INT. TRANSPORTER ROOM - ANGLE ON TRANSPORTER CHIEF,

quote: I've heard all the legends about   him, too. Not only the Falcon's   missions and the Mordan rescue,   but the Gettysburg's explorations,   his command of the old Pegasus   in the Klingon conflicts....
scene: 12   INT. TRANSPORTER ROOM - ANGLE ON TRANSPORTER CHIEF,

quote: Welcome aboard, Admiral.       My executive officer, Commander   William Riker.
scene: 12   INT. TRANSPORTER ROOM - ANGLE ON TRANSPORTER CHIEF,

quote: My pleasure, sir.       Ma'am.
scene: 12   INT. TRANSPORTER ROOM - ANGLE ON TRANSPORTER CHIEF,

quote: My wife, Anne.
scene: 12   INT. TRANSPORTER ROOM - ANGLE ON TRANSPORTER CHIEF,

quote: Captain, there are certain details   of this mission that you should   understand before we begin.
scene: 12   INT. TRANSPORTER ROOM - ANGLE ON TRANSPORTER CHIEF,

quote: Is this the place to be discussing   them, sir?
scene: 12   INT. TRANSPORTER ROOM - ANGLE ON TRANSPORTER CHIEF,

quote: Why not? You and your first   officer are both here.
scene: 12   INT. TRANSPORTER ROOM - ANGLE ON TRANSPORTER CHIEF,

quote: Yes, sir.
scene: 12   INT. TRANSPORTER ROOM - ANGLE ON TRANSPORTER CHIEF,

quote: Captain, I am not simply an   advisor. On any assignment I   accompany, Starfleet has   designated me Senior Mission   Officer. I control the Away Team   and all its actions. Is that   understood?
scene: 12   INT. TRANSPORTER ROOM - ANGLE ON TRANSPORTER CHIEF,

quote: Of course, Captain, you will   command the ship -- but the   mission is mine. I trust you   are in complete agreement.
scene: 12   INT. TRANSPORTER ROOM - ANGLE ON TRANSPORTER CHIEF,

quote: Yes, sir. Of course.
scene: 12   INT. TRANSPORTER ROOM - ANGLE ON TRANSPORTER CHIEF,

quote: Response to our message coming   in from Mordan, sir.
scene: 17   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE TOWARD GEORDI AND DATA

quote: Put it on the screen, Mister Data.
scene: 17   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE TOWARD GEORDI AND DATA

quote: Mordan IV to Enterprise. This   is Karnas. I will speak to the   captain.
scene: 17   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE TOWARD GEORDI AND DATA

quote: I am Captain Picard, in command   of the Enterprise.
scene: 17   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE TOWARD GEORDI AND DATA

quote: Is Admiral Jameson on board?
scene: 17   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE TOWARD GEORDI AND DATA

quote: He is here, beside my first   officer. Do you wish to speak   to him now?
scene: 17   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE TOWARD GEORDI AND DATA

quote: So, Jameson.       I see time has not been kind.
scene: 17   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE TOWARD GEORDI AND DATA

quote: It seldom is, Karnas. However,   we could save a good deal of it   now if you'll outline the   terrorists' demands....
scene: 17   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE TOWARD GEORDI AND DATA

quote: They insist all discussions will   take place here... on Mordan. They   refuse to speak to me -- only to   you.
scene: 17   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE TOWARD GEORDI AND DATA

quote: They could relay their terms on   your communications channels....
scene: 17   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE TOWARD GEORDI AND DATA

quote: They insist on speaking face to   face when you arrive. They say   they will brook no excuses. If   there are any offered, your   ambassador and his people will   die. Unpleasantly. I believe   them -- and so should you,   Admiral.
scene: 17   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE TOWARD GEORDI AND DATA

quote: Tell them I accept the conditions   of negotiation.
scene: 17   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE TOWARD GEORDI AND DATA

quote: I will do so immediately. Karnas   out.
scene: 17   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE TOWARD GEORDI AND DATA

quote: For a man in his position, Karnas   doesn't seem to know much about   the situation.
scene: 17   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE TOWARD GEORDI AND DATA

quote: Wrong, Number One. He told me   the terrorists are desperate   enough to kill if they're crossed.   They're willing to talk one on   one, but not to him.
scene: 17   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE TOWARD GEORDI AND DATA

quote: Counselor?
scene: 17   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE TOWARD GEORDI AND DATA

quote: From his body language as well   as his words and tone... I'd judge   that what Karnas said was honest,   but I sensed a holding back.
scene: 17   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE TOWARD GEORDI AND DATA

quote: Perhaps he knows more about the   terrorists than he is willing to   admit.
scene: 17   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE TOWARD GEORDI AND DATA

quote: Possible, but I suspect it's   closer to the mark if we said he   doesn't want to admit failure of   his own efforts to negotiate.   He is a proud man.
scene: 17   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE TOWARD GEORDI AND DATA

quote: That could be, sir. Karnas has   established himself as a powerful   man on Mordan. Suddenly -- in   this situation -- his power is   useless.
scene: 17   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE TOWARD GEORDI AND DATA

quote: Sickbay to bridge. I am ready   for Admiral Jameson now.
scene: 17   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE TOWARD GEORDI AND DATA

quote: He is on his way, Doctor.
scene: 17   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE TOWARD GEORDI AND DATA

quote: On my way to what, Captain?
scene: 17   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE TOWARD GEORDI AND DATA

quote: Just a routine medical checkup.   Ship's regulations.
scene: 17   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE TOWARD GEORDI AND DATA

quote: Pardon me, sir, but refusing a   simple medical check --
scene: 27   INT. SICKBAY - CLOSE ON BEVERLY

quote: I'm sorry, Doctor, but it isn't   necessary.       The chief medical officer on   Starbase 45 ran a complete battery   of tests on me two days ago.   Semi-annual exam. You'll find   I've been a victim of Iverson's   Disease for five years. My   "case," as you doctors like to   call it, is now chronic. In   another year, it will undoubtedly   progress to terminal.
scene: 27   INT. SICKBAY - CLOSE ON BEVERLY

quote: I'm sorry --
scene: 27   INT. SICKBAY - CLOSE ON BEVERLY

quote: No need. I do not accept the   prognosis, Doctor. But right now,   I don't have time to waste, and   there's no point in you wasting   your time either.       There's your information.
scene: 27   INT. SICKBAY - CLOSE ON BEVERLY

quote: Thank you, Admiral. I'll look   them over.
scene: 27   INT. SICKBAY - CLOSE ON BEVERLY

quote: What I don't understand, sir, is   how Karnas knew you were still...   available.
scene: 29   INT. CAPTAIN'S READY ROOM - WIDE SHOT

quote: Still alive, you mean.
scene: 29   INT. CAPTAIN'S READY ROOM - WIDE SHOT

quote: So far as Karnas knew, you might   have been dead, sir.
scene: 29   INT. CAPTAIN'S READY ROOM - WIDE SHOT

quote: Quite right, Commander. But I'm   not, and I imagine Ambassador   Hawkins told him that. I briefed   the ambassador about Mordan   before he left to take up   residence.
scene: 29   INT. CAPTAIN'S READY ROOM - WIDE SHOT

quote: All right. Karnas has a problem   he feels you can handle. What   can the terrorists want that   Karnas can't or won't give them?
scene: 29   INT. CAPTAIN'S READY ROOM - WIDE SHOT

quote: Mordan has had peace for five   years. They have finally come   to a state of productivity that   satisfies their planetary needs,   but no more than that. Perhaps   the dissidents feel the Federation   can provide more -- technology,   science, agricultural   assistance....
scene: 29   INT. CAPTAIN'S READY ROOM - WIDE SHOT

quote: I've negotiated many a treaty on   many planets, Picard. I've found   that peace -- or the appearance   of it -- is often a prelude to   war.
scene: 29   INT. CAPTAIN'S READY ROOM - WIDE SHOT

quote: Admiral are you suggesting the   terrorists want arms and weapons?
scene: 29   INT. CAPTAIN'S READY ROOM - WIDE SHOT

quote: They may. I am suggesting Karnas   is the last man to give them such   weapons.
scene: 29   INT. CAPTAIN'S READY ROOM - WIDE SHOT

quote: Karnas worked and fought for   years to achieve peace.
scene: 29   INT. CAPTAIN'S READY ROOM - WIDE SHOT

quote: And he's not likely to throw it   away... even for the lives of the   hostages.
scene: 29   INT. CAPTAIN'S READY ROOM - WIDE SHOT

quote: I see. You believe Karnas won't   negotiate on that point, so the   terrorists demanded an outside   negotiator.
scene: 29   INT. CAPTAIN'S READY ROOM - WIDE SHOT

quote: I know Karnas. He is a warrior...   he lives for challenge. These   people have insulted his honor   by taking the embassy staff   hostage. I'll negotiate -- but   I'll have to be very careful in   handling Karnas. He'll want   revenge for that insult.
scene: 29   INT. CAPTAIN'S READY ROOM - WIDE SHOT

quote: ... You're late. Couldn't get away   from the bridge?
scene: 30   INT. JAMESON QUARTERS - ANNE AND JAMESON

quote: Didn't want to. It feels good   to be on one again.
scene: 30   INT. JAMESON QUARTERS - ANNE AND JAMESON

quote: I'm glad, Mark.       Do you want me to help you up?
scene: 30   INT. JAMESON QUARTERS - ANNE AND JAMESON

quote: You're stronger today...
scene: 30   INT. JAMESON QUARTERS - ANNE AND JAMESON

quote: I'm fine. Feel like a kid again.
scene: 30   INT. JAMESON QUARTERS - ANNE AND JAMESON

quote: This ship is magnificent. Pity   we didn't have them twenty, thirty   years ago. We could have been   together almost all of your   career.
scene: 30   INT. JAMESON QUARTERS - ANNE AND JAMESON

quote: It's so good to be able to be with   you now.
scene: 30   INT. JAMESON QUARTERS - ANNE AND JAMESON

quote: Mark! I'll call Sickbay --
scene: 30   INT. JAMESON QUARTERS - ANNE AND JAMESON

quote: No! There's no need. It's   happened before --
scene: 30   INT. JAMESON QUARTERS - ANNE AND JAMESON

quote: When? You haven't said anything   --
scene: 30   INT. JAMESON QUARTERS - ANNE AND JAMESON

quote: It'll pass... give me a moment....
scene: 30   INT. JAMESON QUARTERS - ANNE AND JAMESON

quote: See... I'm better. It's going   away.
scene: 30   INT. JAMESON QUARTERS - ANNE AND JAMESON

quote: What is it? Do the doctors know?
scene: 30   INT. JAMESON QUARTERS - ANNE AND JAMESON

quote: Just body changes... My last   checkup, they said I'd have to   expect it.
scene: 30   INT. JAMESON QUARTERS - ANNE AND JAMESON

quote: You're sure? Don't lie to me.
scene: 30   INT. JAMESON QUARTERS - ANNE AND JAMESON

quote: I'm sure.
scene: 30   INT. JAMESON QUARTERS - ANNE AND JAMESON

quote: ... All the medical information   the admiral provided is   satisfactory, sir....
scene: 33   INT. CAPTAIN'S READY ROOM - TWO SHOT - BEVERLY AND

quote: Excellent, Doctor --
scene: 33   INT. CAPTAIN'S READY ROOM - TWO SHOT - BEVERLY AND

quote: Except for one thing.
scene: 33   INT. CAPTAIN'S READY ROOM - TWO SHOT - BEVERLY AND

quote: The test results he gave me aren't   two days old, they're two months   old. The medical file coder   always includes the date as part   of the file number. He lied to   me, sir -- and I don't know why.
scene: 33   INT. CAPTAIN'S READY ROOM - TWO SHOT - BEVERLY AND

quote: He is eighty years old, Doctor.   For some, the memory begins to   fail....
scene: 33   INT. CAPTAIN'S READY ROOM - TWO SHOT - BEVERLY AND

quote: He suffers from Iverson's Disease,   sir. It affects the body -- not   the mind. I just have a gut   feeling he's hiding something.
scene: 33   INT. CAPTAIN'S READY ROOM - TWO SHOT - BEVERLY AND

quote: I'd expect that observation from   Counselor Troi, but --       I respect your opinion, Doctor.   And I'll want you on the bridge   for the next day or so. The   admiral has to remain in the best   of health for these negotiations.   He might require your services.
scene: 33   INT. CAPTAIN'S READY ROOM - TWO SHOT - BEVERLY AND

quote: Captain's personal log... I am   puzzled and somewhat concerned   by the dating error Admiral   Jameson made on his medical   records.
scene: 34   EXT. SPACE - ENTERPRISE (OPTICAL)

quote: (rises, turns to     Jameson)   Admiral, we're approaching the   Idini Star Cluster. Would you   like to take the Conn as we make   transit?
scene: 35   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE ON COMMAND AREA

quote: Thank you, Captain. I would.
scene: 35   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE ON COMMAND AREA

quote: Well, Admiral. Quite a little   surprise you've pulled on us.
scene: 35   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE ON COMMAND AREA

quote: Yes. Quite.
scene: 35   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE ON COMMAND AREA

quote: Neglected to mention... I began   some new therapy before I left.   Seems to be working. I haven't   felt this good since the last time   I was in space. The Gettysburg.   All I needed to get me out of that   chair was the thought of walking   the decks in command of a starship   again.
scene: 35   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE ON COMMAND AREA

quote: Admiral... you only have the Conn   temporarily.
scene: 35   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE ON COMMAND AREA

quote: Figure of speech. Of course she's   your ship.       I'll just keep an eye on her for   a while.
scene: 35   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE ON COMMAND AREA

quote: The admiral displayed a remarkable   improvement out there, wouldn't   you say?
scene: 41   INT. CAPTAIN'S READY ROOM - PICARD, BEVERLY

quote: Captain, no one recovers from   Iverson's Disease. There is no   known cure, and there are no cases   where it has gone into remission.   I haven't heard of any new   therapy that would have results   like this.
scene: 41   INT. CAPTAIN'S READY ROOM - PICARD, BEVERLY

quote: Then how do you account for it?
scene: 41   INT. CAPTAIN'S READY ROOM - PICARD, BEVERLY

quote: I can't. All I can tell you is   that the admiral has been confined   to the support chair for four   years by the effects of Iverson's.   By all the medical facts we know,   he should never have walked again.
scene: 41   INT. CAPTAIN'S READY ROOM - PICARD, BEVERLY

quote: I'd like you to look into it,   Doctor. Thoroughly.
scene: 41   INT. CAPTAIN'S READY ROOM - PICARD, BEVERLY

quote: Yes, sir.
scene: 41   INT. CAPTAIN'S READY ROOM - PICARD, BEVERLY

quote: The terrorists have given you   six Earth days to bring him here   -- or the hostages will die.   Please...hurry.
scene: 43   INT. JAMESON QUARTERS - ANGLE ON JAMESON

quote: I don't know how much more   information you think you can get   out of that tape.
scene: 43   INT. JAMESON QUARTERS - ANGLE ON JAMESON

quote: Mark... ? My God... what happened?
scene: 43   INT. JAMESON QUARTERS - ANGLE ON JAMESON

quote: It's a new therapy I've been   taking. It's -- working, Anne.
scene: 43   INT. JAMESON QUARTERS - ANGLE ON JAMESON

quote: Oh, Mark!
scene: 43   INT. JAMESON QUARTERS - ANGLE ON JAMESON

quote: Mark... ?
scene: 43   INT. JAMESON QUARTERS - ANGLE ON JAMESON

quote: I told you I just needed to get   back into space again.
scene: 43   INT. JAMESON QUARTERS - ANGLE ON JAMESON

quote: You're really looking much   better....
scene: 43   INT. JAMESON QUARTERS - ANGLE ON JAMESON

quote: It's the new treatment.
scene: 43   INT. JAMESON QUARTERS - ANGLE ON JAMESON

quote: No... come here....
scene: 43   INT. JAMESON QUARTERS - ANGLE ON JAMESON

quote: (makes another grab for     her)   I hope you're heading for the   bedroom.
scene: 43   INT. JAMESON QUARTERS - ANGLE ON JAMESON

quote: Stop it, Mark.
scene: 43   INT. JAMESON QUARTERS - ANGLE ON JAMESON

quote: Mark, you look like you did twenty   years ago.
scene: 43   INT. JAMESON QUARTERS - ANGLE ON JAMESON

quote: You're flattering me.
scene: 43   INT. JAMESON QUARTERS - ANGLE ON JAMESON

quote: Mark, what the hell is going on?
scene: 43   INT. JAMESON QUARTERS - ANGLE ON JAMESON

quote: I don't know what --
scene: 43   INT. JAMESON QUARTERS - ANGLE ON JAMESON

quote: Mark!
scene: 43   INT. JAMESON QUARTERS - ANGLE ON JAMESON

quote: Sickbay! Medical emergency in   the admiral's quarters!
scene: 43   INT. JAMESON QUARTERS - ANGLE ON JAMESON

quote: I've found traces of chemical   substances in his blood and tissue   samples, but none of them are in   our pharmacopeia. We're still   working on alien references to   substances like these. All I can   say is that he ingested something   that's strongly affecting his   body.
scene: 48   INT. CRUSHER'S OFFICE - BEVERLY AND PICARD

quote: Specifics, Doctor.
scene: 48   INT. CRUSHER'S OFFICE - BEVERLY AND PICARD

quote: Captain, there are so many things   going on here, I can't be positive   without a lot more tests.
scene: 48   INT. CRUSHER'S OFFICE - BEVERLY AND PICARD

quote: Give me what you have now.
scene: 48   INT. CRUSHER'S OFFICE - BEVERLY AND PICARD

quote: His red cell count is running   riot. Then there's the cellular   structure of his body tissue.   It's -- changing. I can't even   begin on that until I see what   it's changing to. His DNA is all   skewed. I don't know how it's   possible, but he even looks   younger. And Captain... there   is absolutely no sign of Iverson's   Disease.
scene: 48   INT. CRUSHER'S OFFICE - BEVERLY AND PICARD

quote: You said there is no cure for   Iverson's.
scene: 48   INT. CRUSHER'S OFFICE - BEVERLY AND PICARD

quote: None we know of. Whatever else   these substances are doing to his   body, at least they've done that   for him. But how or why, I can't   say on the information I have now.
scene: 48   INT. CRUSHER'S OFFICE - BEVERLY AND PICARD

quote: Get me some answers, Doctor. As   soon as possible.
scene: 48   INT. CRUSHER'S OFFICE - BEVERLY AND PICARD

quote: Yes, sir.
scene: 48   INT. CRUSHER'S OFFICE - BEVERLY AND PICARD

quote: Captain....
scene: 49   INT. JAMESONS' QUARTERS - ANGLE AT THE DOOR

quote: There are some questions I have   to ask the admiral, Mrs. Jameson.
scene: 49   INT. JAMESONS' QUARTERS - ANGLE AT THE DOOR

quote: Ask away. There's nothing to hide   now.
scene: 49   INT. JAMESONS' QUARTERS - ANGLE AT THE DOOR

quote: Admiral -- in addition to your   rank, you are a particularly   valuable commodity just now.   Starfleet has a right to some   answers.
scene: 49   INT. JAMESONS' QUARTERS - ANGLE AT THE DOOR

quote: I'd been planning this for a long   time -- ever since I learned I   had Iverson's Disease. Since it   put me in that chair.
scene: 49   INT. JAMESONS' QUARTERS - ANGLE AT THE DOOR

quote: What did you do, Mark?
scene: 49   INT. JAMESONS' QUARTERS - ANGLE AT THE DOOR

quote: There's a planet in the Cerberus   system -- Cerberus II -- they say   the natives have a process that   rejuvenates the body... gives you   your youth back.
scene: 49   INT. JAMESONS' QUARTERS - ANGLE AT THE DOOR

quote: I've heard that story, too. It's   a myth.
scene: 49   INT. JAMESONS' QUARTERS - ANGLE AT THE DOOR

quote: It's true, Picard. I'm the living   proof. Oh, it's dangerous -- the   mortality rate is high -- and it's   painful.       Very painful. Aliens are seldom   allowed to obtain the process,   but I managed it. I negotiated   a treaty for Cerberus II several   years ago, and they felt obligated   to honor my request for the   process.
scene: 49   INT. JAMESONS' QUARTERS - ANGLE AT THE DOOR

quote: Obviously it works rapidly. How   does it work?
scene: 49   INT. JAMESONS' QUARTERS - ANGLE AT THE DOOR

quote: The herb and drug combinations   are self-administered... slowly,   over a period of two years. Every   response is different, depending   on a being's DNA.       I got enough for both of us, Anne   -- but I had to test it on myself   first. I couldn't risk you. If   I died... well, I was half a man   anyway, to what did it matter... ?
scene: 49   INT. JAMESONS' QUARTERS - ANGLE AT THE DOOR

quote: It would matter to me.
scene: 49   INT. JAMESONS' QUARTERS - ANGLE AT THE DOOR

quote: But I was starting to change,   Anne. It was almost undetectable,   but the improvement was there.   Then this hostage situation came   up, and I knew I'd have to be at   my peak to deal with it. I   didn't have time to wait for the   drugs to work naturally --
scene: 49   INT. JAMESONS' QUARTERS - ANGLE AT THE DOOR

quote: You took the whole dose.
scene: 49   INT. JAMESONS' QUARTERS - ANGLE AT THE DOOR

quote: I took both of them. And look   at me! Annie, look at me. I'm   strong, alert, I'm fit. I'm   fitter than you are, Picard. And   I'm getting younger!
scene: 49   INT. JAMESONS' QUARTERS - ANGLE AT THE DOOR

quote: The only question I have, Admiral,   is why you felt it necessary to   be young to negotiate the hostage   release. Surely Karnas requested   you because of your age and   experience.
scene: 49   INT. JAMESONS' QUARTERS - ANGLE AT THE DOOR

quote: I'll be on the bridge, Admiral,   if you wish to talk further.
scene: 49   INT. JAMESONS' QUARTERS - ANGLE AT THE DOOR

quote: Why didn't you tell me, Mark?   We've always been honest with each   other -- until now.
scene: 49   INT. JAMESONS' QUARTERS - ANGLE AT THE DOOR

quote: Annie, I did it for us.
scene: 49   INT. JAMESONS' QUARTERS - ANGLE AT THE DOOR

quote: I'm sure you believed that --   until you had a chance to head   up a mission... to command again.   Then you just upended the bottle   -- or whatever it was -- and damn   all. Did you think about me at   all?
scene: 49   INT. JAMESONS' QUARTERS - ANGLE AT THE DOOR

quote: I got enough of the dosage for   both of us....
scene: 49   INT. JAMESONS' QUARTERS - ANGLE AT THE DOOR

quote: But you never asked if I wanted   it. It's just like you, Mark,   to assume that what you felt was   right was the only answer.
scene: 49   INT. JAMESONS' QUARTERS - ANGLE AT THE DOOR

quote: It was the right answer for me.   It was killing you, having to take   care of an invalid. What good   was I to you? Annie -- we can   be together again....
scene: 49   INT. JAMESONS' QUARTERS - ANGLE AT THE DOOR

quote: Let me go!
scene: 49   INT. JAMESONS' QUARTERS - ANGLE AT THE DOOR

quote: I can get another supply of the   drug for you --
scene: 49   INT. JAMESONS' QUARTERS - ANGLE AT THE DOOR

quote: Commander Data, I wish to open   a communication frequency to   Karnas.
scene: 54   INT. CONFERENCE LOUNGE - ANGLE ON JAMESON

quote: Aye, sir.
scene: 55   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE ON PICARD AND DATA

quote: A moment, Mister Data. Admiral,   this is Picard. May I know the   purpose of this communication?
scene: 55   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE ON PICARD AND DATA

quote: Karnas must have tried to   negotiate with the terrorists   before he was forced to call on   me. I want all the information   he has access to.
scene: 56   INT. CONFERENCE LOUNGE - ON JAMESON

quote: You said he was a proud man...   probably sensitive about his   failure to deal with the   situation. Is it wise to press   him on this?
scene: 56   INT. CONFERENCE LOUNGE - ON JAMESON

quote: I'm the negotiator, Picard.   Karnas will have to cooperate   with me and the terrorists, and   damn his sensitivities.
scene: 56   INT. CONFERENCE LOUNGE - ON JAMESON

quote: Then I suggest a secured channel,   Admiral.
scene: 56   INT. CONFERENCE LOUNGE - ON JAMESON

quote: A sensible precaution, Picard.   Make it so.
scene: 56   INT. CONFERENCE LOUNGE - ON JAMESON

quote: Aye, sir. Frequency open and   secured.
scene: 56   INT. CONFERENCE LOUNGE - ON JAMESON

quote: Karnas.
scene: 58   INT. CONFERENCE ROOM - ON JAMESON

quote: What is it you want, Admiral?
scene: 58   INT. CONFERENCE ROOM - ON JAMESON

quote: We're on a secured channel,   Karnas. You can talk freely.   Who's behind this thing? You said   dissidents.
scene: 58   INT. CONFERENCE ROOM - ON JAMESON

quote: Yes... political opponents who feel   the Federation will disavow me   as governor if they stir up enough   trouble on Mordan.
scene: 58   INT. CONFERENCE ROOM - ON JAMESON

quote: Then who is it? Ardan? Gilnor?
scene: 58   INT. CONFERENCE ROOM - ON JAMESON

quote: They're dead, Jameson. A long   time now. For a long time I   thought you were dead, too.
scene: 58   INT. CONFERENCE ROOM - ON JAMESON

quote: I almost died a couple of times   on missions, but I always made   it through somehow.
scene: 58   INT. CONFERENCE ROOM - ON JAMESON

quote: Yes. Now you're coming back to   Mordan -- to negotiate for   hostages again. It's almost as   though the forty-five years   between never happened....
scene: 58   INT. CONFERENCE ROOM - ON JAMESON

quote: You've never forgiven me.
scene: 58   INT. CONFERENCE ROOM - ON JAMESON

quote: Should I have -- after the legacy   of war you left us in your last   "negotiation?"
scene: 58   INT. CONFERENCE ROOM - ON JAMESON

quote: There are no dissidents, are   there? No terrorists. You have   the hostages.
scene: 58   INT. CONFERENCE ROOM - ON JAMESON

quote: And if I have? You're coming to   Mordan, Jameson. You're going   to negotiate for their lives, and   I'm going to ask a very high price   for them.
scene: 58   INT. CONFERENCE ROOM - ON JAMESON

quote: What if I refuse?
scene: 58   INT. CONFERENCE ROOM - ON JAMESON

quote: Then the hostages will die.   You've seen how my executioners   work. They are still as efficient   as they were... perhaps even more   skilled now. You'll come -- even   if you don't have much honor left.   Karnas out.
scene: 58   INT. CONFERENCE ROOM - ON JAMESON

quote: Are we still on schedule to arrive   at Mordan in thirty-eight hours?
scene: 63   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - FULL SHOT

quote: Yes, sir. We're at warp four now.
scene: 63   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - FULL SHOT

quote: Picard, I want a jump to warp eight   so we arrive ahead of our announced   ETA. It'll throw Karnas off balance,   and we can catch him before he's   ready.
scene: 63   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - FULL SHOT

quote: Ready for exactly what, Admiral?
scene: 63   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - FULL SHOT

quote: I believe Karnas is planning   something new... something that   will directly endanger the   hostages' lives.
scene: 63   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - FULL SHOT

quote: What happened in your   communication to bring you to that   conclusion? It seems a big   jump....
scene: 63   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - FULL SHOT

quote: I'm not at liberty to say, Picard,   but negotiation is not the answer   or the issue here. The hostages'   lives are at stake.
scene: 63   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - FULL SHOT

quote: I agree the most important thing   is saving the lives of the   hostages...
scene: 63   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - FULL SHOT

quote: And you agree with that, too,   Riker?
scene: 63   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - FULL SHOT

quote: I do, sir.
scene: 63   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - FULL SHOT

quote: Good. Because I plan to   personally lead an away team on   an armed rescue mission to get   them out of there.
scene: 63   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - FULL SHOT

quote: Commander Data, will you bring   up the plans I requested on the   Viewscreen, please.
scene: 65   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - FULL SHOT

quote: Yes, sir.
scene: 65   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - FULL SHOT

quote: Most of Mordan's principal city   was devastated in the war. What   was left consisted of a network   of underground tunnels -- a rat's   maze. When they rebuilt the city,   they simply built over the   tunnels.
scene: 65   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - FULL SHOT

quote: I have it, sir.
scene: 65   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - FULL SHOT

quote: Admiral, even if you're right   about Karnas being behind this,   he still wants to negotiate. Or   at least to talk. Why not hear   what he has to say?
scene: 65   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - FULL SHOT

quote: I've heard what he has to say,   and I have good reason to believe   he's lying.
scene: 65   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - FULL SHOT

quote: Pardon me, sir, but where do these   come into the picture?
scene: 65   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - FULL SHOT

quote: This is where Karnas held his   hostages before and where I   believe he has them now.
scene: 65   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - FULL SHOT

quote: Wouldn't that be a little too   obvious, Admiral?
scene: 65   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - FULL SHOT

quote: Karnas is a dogged strategist,   Picard -- not a brilliant one.   He sticks to what works.
scene: 65   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - FULL SHOT

quote: An overt rescue attempt could push   Karnas into killing the hostages   outright.
scene: 65   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - FULL SHOT

quote: I don't think that's what he   wants, Picard.
scene: 65   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - FULL SHOT

quote: Then what does he want?
scene: 65   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - FULL SHOT

quote: Maybe his threats are just a way   to bargain for what he wants....
scene: 65   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - FULL SHOT

quote: Karnas means exactly what he   says, Lieutenant. He will kill   the hostages if we don't get them   out of there.
scene: 65   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - FULL SHOT

quote: Therefore you see an armed raid   as our only option.
scene: 65   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - FULL SHOT

quote: You don't agree.
scene: 65   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - FULL SHOT

quote: I would point out no one else has   heard or considered Karnas's   demands but you, Admiral. The   Federation might take a different   view of them if they knew what   they were.
scene: 65   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - FULL SHOT

quote: Starfleet gave me command of the   away team, Picard. I intend to   use them as I see fit.
scene: 65   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - FULL SHOT

quote: Is Jameson physically able to lead   an away mission, Doctor?
scene: 68   INT. CAPTAIN'S READY ROOM - PICARD, TROI, BEVERLY

quote: His cells, his tissue, even his   bones are still de-aging, but I'd   say he was. Generally, I'd call   Admiral Jameson a healthy   man... about forty-five... in   excellent physical condition.
scene: 68   INT. CAPTAIN'S READY ROOM - PICARD, TROI, BEVERLY

quote: What about his mind?
scene: 68   INT. CAPTAIN'S READY ROOM - PICARD, TROI, BEVERLY

quote: The same. Brain scan reveals all   cells and tissue are changing,   but healthy. No loss of   memory... exellent grasp of facts.
scene: 68   INT. CAPTAIN'S READY ROOM - PICARD, TROI, BEVERLY

quote: Counselor?
scene: 68   INT. CAPTAIN'S READY ROOM - PICARD, TROI, BEVERLY

quote: Certainly his physical capacities   have been restored. I sense that   gives him great satisfaction.   When he came aboard, he seemed   hopeful, eager. Now there seems   to be a harder, more forceful   attitude... ambition....
scene: 68   INT. CAPTAIN'S READY ROOM - PICARD, TROI, BEVERLY

quote: More of a young man's attitude,   I'd say. Aggressive... going right   for the throat of a situation   instead of considering the   alternatives.
scene: 68   INT. CAPTAIN'S READY ROOM - PICARD, TROI, BEVERLY

quote: Part of that is ambition too.   He wants to be the man he once   was. He is the man he once was,   but sometimes old memories aren't   very accurate. He was able to   lead away teams like this once.   Now he believes he can do it   again.
scene: 68   INT. CAPTAIN'S READY ROOM - PICARD, TROI, BEVERLY

quote: Our anniversary is next week.   Fifty years....
scene: 69   INT. CRUSHER'S OFFICE - BEVERLY, TROI, ANNE

quote: In his heart, he's still the same   man you married, Anne.
scene: 69   INT. CRUSHER'S OFFICE - BEVERLY, TROI, ANNE

quote: That's true. He still cares for   you, despite the physical changes   he's undergoing.
scene: 69   INT. CRUSHER'S OFFICE - BEVERLY, TROI, ANNE

quote: But he's getting younger, and I'm   -- well, look at me. Why did he   do this... ?
scene: 69   INT. CRUSHER'S OFFICE - BEVERLY, TROI, ANNE

quote: There are lives at stake, Mrs.   Jameson.
scene: 69   INT. CRUSHER'S OFFICE - BEVERLY, TROI, ANNE

quote: What about our lives? Mine and   his, together?
scene: 69   INT. CRUSHER'S OFFICE - BEVERLY, TROI, ANNE

quote: Anne... I think I know a little   of what you're feeling. My   husband died on an away mission.   We'd been married two years. So   little time. Look at what you've   had with Mark --
scene: 69   INT. CRUSHER'S OFFICE - BEVERLY, TROI, ANNE

quote: Years, yes -- but not together.   I was looking forward to time   together finally -- our   retirement. Now he's young again   and has a life to live over.
scene: 69   INT. CRUSHER'S OFFICE - BEVERLY, TROI, ANNE

quote: She has to know, Doctor.
scene: 69   INT. CRUSHER'S OFFICE - BEVERLY, TROI, ANNE

quote: Know what?
scene: 69   INT. CRUSHER'S OFFICE - BEVERLY, TROI, ANNE

quote: Anne... he's --
scene: 69   INT. CRUSHER'S OFFICE - BEVERLY, TROI, ANNE

quote: What is it?
scene: 69   INT. CRUSHER'S OFFICE - BEVERLY, TROI, ANNE

quote: He's not stabilizing.       He may not have that life to live   over.
scene: 69   INT. CRUSHER'S OFFICE - BEVERLY, TROI, ANNE

quote: We'll be at Mordan in three hours.
scene: 71   INT. OBSERVATION LOUNGE - WIDE ANGLE

quote: I couldn't sleep either.
scene: 71   INT. OBSERVATION LOUNGE - WIDE ANGLE

quote: I never could before a mission.   Always wound up in the Observation   Lounge, staring out at the stars.   Thinking.
scene: 71   INT. OBSERVATION LOUNGE - WIDE ANGLE

quote: Maybe in this case rethinking?
scene: 71   INT. OBSERVATION LOUNGE - WIDE ANGLE

quote: Perceptive. They always have   given you high marks for that at   Starfleet, Picard.
scene: 71   INT. OBSERVATION LOUNGE - WIDE ANGLE

quote: Why is this mission so important   to you? Why did you risk your   life so you could lead it   personally?
scene: 71   INT. OBSERVATION LOUNGE - WIDE ANGLE

quote: I want to save lives, Picard.
scene: 71   INT. OBSERVATION LOUNGE - WIDE ANGLE

quote: Noble sentiment -- but too easy   an answer. You've been here   before. You negotiated a release   of hostages with Karnas before.   Why is it now your answer is an   armed raid?
scene: 71   INT. OBSERVATION LOUNGE - WIDE ANGLE

quote: It's my away team you're going   to send in. There's something   you're not telling me, and I have   a right to know what it is.
scene: 71   INT. OBSERVATION LOUNGE - WIDE ANGLE

quote: Do you know the background? The   Mordanites had some   sophistication, but were still   ruled by tribal family units.   Karnas's father was the ruling   chief of one of the families, and   another tribe had him   assassinated. Karnas seized the   passengers of a starliner and   held them hostage, demanding that   Starfleet provide him with weapons   that would enable him to defeat   his rivals.
scene: 71   INT. OBSERVATION LOUNGE - WIDE ANGLE

quote: That's the official record.
scene: 71   INT. OBSERVATION LOUNGE - WIDE ANGLE

quote: Officially the story is that after   two other mediators were   murdered, I went in and negotiated   with Karnas to bring out the   hostages safely.
scene: 71   INT. OBSERVATION LOUNGE - WIDE ANGLE

quote: Are you saying that's not the   truth?
scene: 71   INT. OBSERVATION LOUNGE - WIDE ANGLE

quote: It wasn't my golden oratory that   saved them, Picard. I gave Karnas   the weapons he wanted.
scene: 71   INT. OBSERVATION LOUNGE - WIDE ANGLE

quote: You did what?
scene: 71   INT. OBSERVATION LOUNGE - WIDE ANGLE

quote: I gave exactly the same weapons   to his rivals. My interpretation   of the Prime Directive. Let them   solve their problems with those   arms on an equal basis.
scene: 71   INT. OBSERVATION LOUNGE - WIDE ANGLE

quote: That decision plunged them into   forty years of civil war.
scene: 71   INT. OBSERVATION LOUNGE - WIDE ANGLE

quote: I didn't know that would happen.   I thought, a minor war -- it'll   be settled in less than a year.   How could I know it would be four   decades? I falsified the reports   to Starfleet, but I've lived with   that on my soul, Picard.   Sixty-three people came away safe   -- but millions died on Mordan   because I delivered those weapons.
scene: 71   INT. OBSERVATION LOUNGE - WIDE ANGLE

quote: Karnas could have worked for peace   all those years instead of   continuing the war. It's not all   on your head, Admiral.
scene: 71   INT. OBSERVATION LOUNGE - WIDE ANGLE

quote: But I started it. I lit the   match. Now, finally, I can   vindicate myself, if only in a   small way. I came to negotiate,   but that isn't what Karnas wants.
scene: 71   INT. OBSERVATION LOUNGE - WIDE ANGLE

quote: Revenge. That's why he demanded   you when he found out you were   still alive.
scene: 71   INT. OBSERVATION LOUNGE - WIDE ANGLE

quote: I'm not going to give it to him,   Picard. I'm going to do what I   should have done the first time.   We're taking the hostages out   by force. No deals.
scene: 71   INT. OBSERVATION LOUNGE - WIDE ANGLE

quote: Prepare to energize, Chief.
scene: 74   INT. TRANSPORTER ROOM - WIDE ANGLE

quote: Belay that.
scene: 74   INT. TRANSPORTER ROOM - WIDE ANGLE

quote: Admiral, the correct place for   you is on the bridge...
scene: 74   INT. TRANSPORTER ROOM - WIDE ANGLE

quote: I will remind you one more time,   Picard, I am the Senior Mission   Commander, and I'm leading this   team.
scene: 74   INT. TRANSPORTER ROOM - WIDE ANGLE

quote: Sir?
scene: 74   INT. TRANSPORTER ROOM - WIDE ANGLE

quote: The Admiral is correct, Number   One. He has that right. But I'm   the captain of this ship, and I   have it, too. You have command   of the Enterprise, Commander   Riker.       Energize.
scene: 74   INT. TRANSPORTER ROOM - WIDE ANGLE

quote: Yes...perfect. We are in the M-4   tunnel directly under the   governor's residence. M-4 is a   subsidiary tunnel, but it crosses   and links with several main ones.
scene: 76   INT. TUNNEL - DAY - ANGLE ON AWAY TEAM

quote: I am sorry, sir. That does not   correspond with the information   I have on the tricorder, sir.
scene: 76   INT. TUNNEL - DAY - ANGLE ON AWAY TEAM

quote: Your information is incorrect,   Commander. I know these tunnels   like the back of my own hand.       That way. It takes us to the   hatch that will let us into M-1   tunnel. Keep scanning for signs   of human life forms. Karnas held   his hostages in these tunnels   before. He'll do it again.
scene: 76   INT. TUNNEL - DAY - ANGLE ON AWAY TEAM

quote: The admiral is definitely   incorrect, Captain. The tunnel   schematics we have indicate this   is a dead end. It was sealed off   two years ago....
scene: 76   INT. TUNNEL - DAY - ANGLE ON AWAY TEAM

quote: I've no doubt you're right, Mister   Data. However, forty-five years   ago, I'm sure it linked in with   the tunnels Admiral Jameson   remembers.
scene: 76   INT. TUNNEL - DAY - ANGLE ON AWAY TEAM

quote: Steelplast. Fairly recent   installation.
scene: 78   INT. TUNNEL #2 - DAY - ANGLE ON THE TEAM (OPTICAL)
location: TUNNEL #2 - DAY - ANGLE ON THE TEAM

quote: Damn. This is the most direct   route. Set phasers to cut through   it.
scene: 78   INT. TUNNEL #2 - DAY - ANGLE ON THE TEAM (OPTICAL)
location: TUNNEL #2 - DAY - ANGLE ON THE TEAM

quote: If you have the coordinates for   where you think the hostages are,   sir, we could just beam in there.
scene: 78   INT. TUNNEL #2 - DAY - ANGLE ON THE TEAM (OPTICAL)
location: TUNNEL #2 - DAY - ANGLE ON THE TEAM

quote: But Karnas might not have them   in the same place. There is no   substitute for a personal   reconnoiter, Lieutenant.
scene: 78   INT. TUNNEL #2 - DAY - ANGLE ON THE TEAM (OPTICAL)
location: TUNNEL #2 - DAY - ANGLE ON THE TEAM

quote: No, sir.
scene: 78   INT. TUNNEL #2 - DAY - ANGLE ON THE TEAM (OPTICAL)
location: TUNNEL #2 - DAY - ANGLE ON THE TEAM

quote: Admiral, there's an infrared light   signal ahead. Steady beam,   straight across the tunnel, chest   high. Another at hip level.
scene: 81   INT. TUNNEL #3 - ON THE AWAY TEAM

quote: An alarm trigger or --
scene: 81   INT. TUNNEL #3 - ON THE AWAY TEAM

quote: Reset phasers to stun.
scene: 81   INT. TUNNEL #3 - ON THE AWAY TEAM

quote: Look out, sir!
scene: 81   INT. TUNNEL #3 - ON THE AWAY TEAM

quote: Their phasers, sir -- set on   kill.
scene: 81   INT. TUNNEL #3 - ON THE AWAY TEAM

quote: Thank you, Mister Data. I have   heard the sound before.
scene: 81   INT. TUNNEL #3 - ON THE AWAY TEAM

quote: Is he hit?
scene: 81   INT. TUNNEL #3 - ON THE AWAY TEAM

quote: I cannot tell --
scene: 81   INT. TUNNEL #3 - ON THE AWAY TEAM

quote: Enterprise, this is Picard. Five   to beam up -- now!
scene: 81   INT. TUNNEL #3 - ON THE AWAY TEAM

quote: How badly is he hurt?
scene: 85   INT. TRANSPORTER ROOM - ANGLE ON PLATFORM

quote: I do not see any sign of a wound,   sir.
scene: 85   INT. TRANSPORTER ROOM - ANGLE ON PLATFORM

quote: It appears to be another attack,   sir.
scene: 85   INT. TRANSPORTER ROOM - ANGLE ON PLATFORM

quote: Call Doctor Crusher here   immediately.
scene: 85   INT. TRANSPORTER ROOM - ANGLE ON PLATFORM

quote: Sir.    (goes to transporter     console)   Transporter Room Three to Sickbay.   Doctor Crusher, please report   immediately with Medical Support   Team.
scene: 85   INT. TRANSPORTER ROOM - ANGLE ON PLATFORM

quote: This last attack is the worst one   he's suffered, sir. The others   were overwith fairly quickly.   He hasn't recovered from this one   yet, and nothing has been able   to relieve his pain.
scene: 90   INT. CRUSHER'S OFFICE - PICARD AND BEVERLY

quote: Do you have any answers, Doctor?
scene: 90   INT. CRUSHER'S OFFICE - PICARD AND BEVERLY

quote: I'm afraid none of it is very   hopeful. The compound he took   seems to be rejuvenating the DNA,   but it's also sloughing off the   old cells too fast for his body   to cope. His body is trying to   grow and die and regenerate all   at the same time.
scene: 90   INT. CRUSHER'S OFFICE - PICARD AND BEVERLY

quote: You're saying the overdose of   the drug he took is working too   well.
scene: 90   INT. CRUSHER'S OFFICE - PICARD AND BEVERLY

quote: Exactly, sir.
scene: 90   INT. CRUSHER'S OFFICE - PICARD AND BEVERLY

quote: When will it stop?
scene: 90   INT. CRUSHER'S OFFICE - PICARD AND BEVERLY

quote: It won't... because it can't.   Eventually, he won't be able to   stand the strain.
scene: 90   INT. CRUSHER'S OFFICE - PICARD AND BEVERLY

quote: The admiral... ?
scene: 91   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ON PICARD

quote: Sickbay. "Not good" is a galactic   understatement.
scene: 91   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ON PICARD

quote: Karnas again, sir. On the screen.
scene: 91   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ON PICARD

quote: Enterprise. There has been an   armed intrusion in the tunnels   beneath the city. That smells   of Jameson. Where is he?
scene: 91   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ON PICARD

quote: This is Picard. I am sorry to   inform you that the admiral is   critically ill, Karnas.
scene: 91   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ON PICARD

quote: (coming out of the     chair)   That is not my concern. Sick or   well, you have ten minutes to beam   him down, Captain Picard.   Otherwise, the hostages die.
scene: 91   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ON PICARD

quote: Sickbay to bridge.
scene: 91   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ON PICARD

quote: Picard.
scene: 91   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ON PICARD

quote: Doctor Crusher requests your presence   in Sickbay immediately, sir.
scene: 91   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ON PICARD

quote: On my way.
scene: 91   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ON PICARD

quote: What is it?
scene: 93   INT. SICKBAY - ANGLE AT DOOR

quote: You'd better see for yourself.
scene: 93   INT. SICKBAY - ANGLE AT DOOR

quote: Picard....
scene: 93   INT. SICKBAY - ANGLE AT DOOR

quote: Picard, I have to get to Karnas.
scene: 93   INT. SICKBAY - ANGLE AT DOOR

quote: I can't allow him out of my care,   sir.
scene: 93   INT. SICKBAY - ANGLE AT DOOR

quote: My last option, Picard. The raid   failed... all I have left to   bargain with is myself....
scene: 93   INT. SICKBAY - ANGLE AT DOOR

quote: Bridge to Picard.
scene: 93   INT. SICKBAY - ANGLE AT DOOR

quote: Picard here. What is it, Number   One?
scene: 93   INT. SICKBAY - ANGLE AT DOOR

quote: A new demand from Karnas, sir.   If we don't deliver Jameson in   five minutes, a hostage will be   executed. Fifteen minutes after   that, another.
scene: 97   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ON RIKER

quote: He promises the method of   execution will be both slow and   painful.
scene: 98   INT. SICKBAY - ON PICARD, BEVERLY, JAMESON

quote: Let me go. If I turn myself over   to him, he'll let the hostages   go. It's me he wants.
scene: 98   INT. SICKBAY - ON PICARD, BEVERLY, JAMESON

quote: It's certain death for you,   Admiral.
scene: 98   INT. SICKBAY - ON PICARD, BEVERLY, JAMESON

quote: My life for how many hostages,   Picard? Twenty?       Let me go.
scene: 98   INT. SICKBAY - ON PICARD, BEVERLY, JAMESON

quote: Number One, inform Karnas we'll   be beaming down in less than five   minutes.
scene: 98   INT. SICKBAY - ON PICARD, BEVERLY, JAMESON

quote: "We," sir?
scene: 98   INT. SICKBAY - ON PICARD, BEVERLY, JAMESON

quote: You have your orders, Number One.
scene: 98   INT. SICKBAY - ON PICARD, BEVERLY, JAMESON

quote: Aye, sir. Riker out.
scene: 98   INT. SICKBAY - ON PICARD, BEVERLY, JAMESON

quote: Captain, you can't go down there   again --    (stops, staring at the     boy)   Jameson... ?
scene: 99   INT. TRANSPORTER ROOM - ANGLE ON PLATFORM

quote: Yes. Exactly why I have to go,   Will. As a Starfleet captain,   I have negotiating powers.       Energize.
scene: 99   INT. TRANSPORTER ROOM - ANGLE ON PLATFORM

quote: Who are you! I want Jameson!
scene: 100  INT. KARNAS'S OFFICE - DAY

quote: This is Admiral Mark Jameson.
scene: 100  INT. KARNAS'S OFFICE - DAY

quote: This charade will accomplish   nothing, Picard. Beam Jameson   down, and the hostages will be   freed. Continue this -- and I   promise you they will die -- and   you with them.
scene: 101  INT. KARNAS'S OFFICE - DAY - PICARD, JAMESON (BOY)

quote: Karnas, if you'll just listen....
scene: 101  INT. KARNAS'S OFFICE - DAY - PICARD, JAMESON (BOY)

quote: Why have you brought him here?   This is no place for children.
scene: 101  INT. KARNAS'S OFFICE - DAY - PICARD, JAMESON (BOY)

quote: Peretor Karnas. You always were   a stubborn man. I thought you   wanted me. I'm here. Release   the hostages. now.
scene: 101  INT. KARNAS'S OFFICE - DAY - PICARD, JAMESON (BOY)

quote: "Peretor" was my old title. Why   do you call me that?
scene: 101  INT. KARNAS'S OFFICE - DAY - PICARD, JAMESON (BOY)

quote: Because you're acting like the   warrior you were -- not like the   planetary governor you are.
scene: 101  INT. KARNAS'S OFFICE - DAY - PICARD, JAMESON (BOY)

quote: Picard, I warn you, this trick   is going too far. He has been   coached... for some devious   reason. If this farce is not   stopped immediately, you and the   hostages will be put to death.
scene: 101  INT. KARNAS'S OFFICE - DAY - PICARD, JAMESON (BOY)

quote: Admiral!
scene: 101  INT. KARNAS'S OFFICE - DAY - PICARD, JAMESON (BOY)

quote: I'm waiting for an explanation,   Captain.
scene: 101  INT. KARNAS'S OFFICE - DAY - PICARD, JAMESON (BOY)

quote: He is the admiral. Before we left   on this mission, he administered   an overdose of an alien de-aging   drug to himself. He wanted to   face you with strength again... on   even terms. This is what the drug   has done to him.
scene: 101  INT. KARNAS'S OFFICE - DAY - PICARD, JAMESON (BOY)

quote: This story you are telling is   unbelievable. Jameson is a man   of eighty, not --       -- this. I want that old man,   Picard. I want to show him this   world he helped to make... the   scars on old soldiers' bodies...   the graveyards of our young   dead... the wasted cities we are   still rebuilding... and all of   it caused by him.
scene: 101  INT. KARNAS'S OFFICE - DAY - PICARD, JAMESON (BOY)

quote: As I understand the facts, Karnas,   you were the one who demanded   weapons to avenge your father's   death.
scene: 101  INT. KARNAS'S OFFICE - DAY - PICARD, JAMESON (BOY)

quote: But Jameson didn't give weapons   only to us. If he had, we would   have triumphed over our enemies   in less than a year, and we would   have had peace in all these   decades. When Jameson gave   weapons to both sides, he gave   us forty years of war. I want   him to pay for that, Picard.
scene: 101  INT. KARNAS'S OFFICE - DAY - PICARD, JAMESON (BOY)

quote: Sir, I think Mrs. Jameson should   beam down. Now.
scene: 101  INT. KARNAS'S OFFICE - DAY - PICARD, JAMESON (BOY)

quote: Do it.
scene: 101  INT. KARNAS'S OFFICE - DAY - PICARD, JAMESON (BOY)

quote: Karnas, I've asked Doctor Crusher   to bring down the visual records   we've made of Admiral Jameson's   deterioration. Will you look at   them?
scene: 101  INT. KARNAS'S OFFICE - DAY - PICARD, JAMESON (BOY)

quote: You're wasting my time, Picard.
scene: 101  INT. KARNAS'S OFFICE - DAY - PICARD, JAMESON (BOY)

quote: Only a few moments.
scene: 101  INT. KARNAS'S OFFICE - DAY - PICARD, JAMESON (BOY)

quote: You saw Admiral Jameson when he   was on board en route to Mordan?
scene: 101  INT. KARNAS'S OFFICE - DAY - PICARD, JAMESON (BOY)

quote: Yes.
scene: 101  INT. KARNAS'S OFFICE - DAY - PICARD, JAMESON (BOY)

quote: You recognized him?
scene: 101  INT. KARNAS'S OFFICE - DAY - PICARD, JAMESON (BOY)

quote: Yes.
scene: 101  INT. KARNAS'S OFFICE - DAY - PICARD, JAMESON (BOY)

quote: And this is the man you saw.
scene: 101  INT. KARNAS'S OFFICE - DAY - PICARD, JAMESON (BOY)

quote: Yes. This is the man I want.
scene: 101  INT. KARNAS'S OFFICE - DAY - PICARD, JAMESON (BOY)

quote: Never again, Karnas.
scene: 101  INT. KARNAS'S OFFICE - DAY - PICARD, JAMESON (BOY)

quote: Once he took the compound ... there   was no way to stop it.
scene: 101  INT. KARNAS'S OFFICE - DAY - PICARD, JAMESON (BOY)

quote: You'll have to deal with me,   Karnas. Whatever you wanted from   Jameson isn't possible any more.
scene: 101  INT. KARNAS'S OFFICE - DAY - PICARD, JAMESON (BOY)

quote: You wanted revenge, Karnas. You   blamed your war on Jameson, and   there's no doubt he had a lot to   do with it. But you had the   weapons, and you used them. You   could have tried for negotiations   for peace on your planet long ago.   You chose to fight instead. How   many of those forty years of war   are on your head?
scene: 101  INT. KARNAS'S OFFICE - DAY - PICARD, JAMESON (BOY)

quote: Jameson has to pay for his   crimes... I have sworn it to my   people. When I found out he was   alive, I gave them my word I would   kill him for what he did. A public   execution... public retribution   for what he did to us.
scene: 101  INT. KARNAS'S OFFICE - DAY - PICARD, JAMESON (BOY)

quote: Then there's Jameson. He wanted   to atone for what he'd done here.   Forty-five years ago, he made the   wrong decision, and he wanted to   come here to somehow right it.   He wanted to negotiate, and when   that failed, he decided to fight.
scene: 101  INT. KARNAS'S OFFICE - DAY - PICARD, JAMESON (BOY)

quote: Your men foiled that, and all he   has left now is to give himself   up to you. He's brought this   retribution on himself.
scene: 101  INT. KARNAS'S OFFICE - DAY - PICARD, JAMESON (BOY)

quote: No. I don't believe you. You   are shielding Jameson on the ship   and telling me this tale to save   his life.
scene: 101  INT. KARNAS'S OFFICE - DAY - PICARD, JAMESON (BOY)

quote: Peretor Karnas... there were only   two of us in the meeting. You   didn't even trust your lieutenants   then. You told me old Peretor   Sain had ordered your father's   assassination. You told me you   wanted arms to destroy him. Peace   wasn't on your mind. You just   wanted revenge. And I gave you   the weapons to do it.
scene: 101  INT. KARNAS'S OFFICE - DAY - PICARD, JAMESON (BOY)

quote: Jameson told you all this.
scene: 101  INT. KARNAS'S OFFICE - DAY - PICARD, JAMESON (BOY)

quote: I am Jameson. Do you want a list   of the weapons I gave you? Only   you and I would know what it was,   because I erased every trace of   them from the records.
scene: 101  INT. KARNAS'S OFFICE - DAY - PICARD, JAMESON (BOY)

quote: Jameson still could have told you   this.       If you are him, show me the scar.
scene: 101  INT. KARNAS'S OFFICE - DAY - PICARD, JAMESON (BOY)

quote: There. The blood cut you gave   me to seal our bargain.
scene: 101  INT. KARNAS'S OFFICE - DAY - PICARD, JAMESON (BOY)

quote: It is you. Somehow... it is you.
scene: 101  INT. KARNAS'S OFFICE - DAY - PICARD, JAMESON (BOY)

quote: Then die by one of your own   weapons!
scene: 101  INT. KARNAS'S OFFICE - DAY - PICARD, JAMESON (BOY)

quote: No. My revenge is in letting   you live like this.
scene: 101  INT. KARNAS'S OFFICE - DAY - PICARD, JAMESON (BOY)

quote: Such pain....
scene: 101  INT. KARNAS'S OFFICE - DAY - PICARD, JAMESON (BOY)

quote: Doctor Crusher?
scene: 101  INT. KARNAS'S OFFICE - DAY - PICARD, JAMESON (BOY)

quote: His body can't rejuvenate any   further. The compound he took   is trying to force the organs and   tissue to go further, younger,   and they can't take the stress.   It's like he's -- imploding. I   can't do anything to stop it, sir.
scene: 101  INT. KARNAS'S OFFICE - DAY - PICARD, JAMESON (BOY)

quote: Can you give him something for   the pain?
scene: 101  INT. KARNAS'S OFFICE - DAY - PICARD, JAMESON (BOY)

quote: Mark... can you hear me?
scene: 101  INT. KARNAS'S OFFICE - DAY - PICARD, JAMESON (BOY)

quote: Yes.
scene: 101  INT. KARNAS'S OFFICE - DAY - PICARD, JAMESON (BOY)

quote: I'll always love you.
scene: 101  INT. KARNAS'S OFFICE - DAY - PICARD, JAMESON (BOY)

quote: Annie with the golden hair....
scene: 101  INT. KARNAS'S OFFICE - DAY - PICARD, JAMESON (BOY)

quote: Flatterer. It's grey now.
scene: 101  INT. KARNAS'S OFFICE - DAY - PICARD, JAMESON (BOY)

quote: I only see the gold....
scene: 101  INT. KARNAS'S OFFICE - DAY - PICARD, JAMESON (BOY)

quote: Rest, Jameson. Your long night   -- and mine -- is over.       The hostages will be released   immediately, Captain. I am   prepared to be -- cooperative.
scene: 101  INT. KARNAS'S OFFICE - DAY - PICARD, JAMESON (BOY)

quote: ... The hostages have been freed   by Karnas, unharmed.       Personal note. The body of   Admiral Mark Jameson has been   buried on Mordan, at the request   of his widow and with the   permission of Karnas. Log out.
scene: 119  INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE ON COMMAND AREA

quote: The quest for youth, Number One...   so futile. Age and wisdom have   their graces.
scene: 119  INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE ON COMMAND AREA

quote: I wonder if one doesn't have to   have age and wisdom to appreciate   that, sir.
scene: 119  INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE ON COMMAND AREA

quote: I hope not, Number One. It would   be such a waste of youth.       Mister La Forge, prepare to take us   out of orbit. Set course for Isis   III.
scene: 119  INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE ON COMMAND AREA

quote: Aye, sir. Leaving orbit.
scene: 119  INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE ON COMMAND AREA
